mapper.select: SELECT thn, thtid, tha, ths, thd, tcategory, CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE, CONS_SCHE_ENDDATE, CONS_SCHE_CONTENT FROM teamhistory, team, constructionschedule WHERE thtid = #{detailTeamId} AND thtid = tid AND CONS_SCHE_TEAMID = tid

SELECT (SELECT count(*) from constructionschedule WHERE CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) AND THTID = CONS_SCHE_TEAMID ) as tmonthWork, (SELECT count(*) from constructionschedule WHERE CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE, 1) AND THTID = CONS_SCHE_TEAMID ) as tweekWork, (SELECT CASE WHEN count(*) >= 1 then '작업중' WHEN count(*) = 0 then '휴게중' END from constructionschedule WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE AND CONS_SCHE_ENDDATE AND THTID = CONS_SCHE_TEAMID) as tnowWork, (SELECT tcategory from team WHERE thtid = tid) as tcategory, ROUND(AVG(ths),2) as ths, THTID, (SELECT COUNT(*) from constructionschedule WHERE CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND THTID = CONS_SCHE_TEAMID ) as sccount FROM constructionschedule, teamhistory, team WHERE THTID = TID GROUP BY THTID ORDER BY ths DESC

SELECT count(case when COUN_SCHE_STARTDATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE, 1) then 1 END ) as cweekWork, count(case when COUN_SCHE_STARTDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') then 1 END ) as ctodayWork, count(case when COUN_SCHE_STARTDATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) then 1 END ) as cmonthWork FROM counselingschedule

select cons_cate_type, cons_sche_startdate, cons_sche_enddate, cons_sche_hospitalname, cons_sche_dln, CONS_SCHE_CONTENT, CONS_SCHE_ADDRESS from constructioncategory, constructionschedule where cons_sche_teamid = #{detailTeamId} AND cons_cate_id = cons_sche_categoryid AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') <= CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE order by CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE

SELECT cons_cate_type, cons_sche_startdate, cons_sche_enddate, cons_sche_hospitalname, cons_sche_dln, CONS_SCHE_CONTENT, CONS_SCHE_ADDRESS FROM constructioncategory, constructionschedule WHERE cons_sche_teamid = #{tid} AND cons_cate_id = cons_sche_categoryid AND TO_CHAR(CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,#{duration}),'YY/MM') ORDER BY CONS_SCHE_STARTDATE
